item.title: Recycle Your Cell Phones and Electronics For Cash
item.description: Probably, you have old electronics like phones, cameras, or gaming devices lying around. Instead of keeping them in a drawer, you can turn them into cash online quickly and easily. A service called uSell helps you find buyers for your old devices. It’s like those travel websites that compare prices from different companies; uSell connects you with various buyers interested in refurbishing or recycling electronics. Just enter your device’s information and condition, and uSell will show you the best cash offers from different buyers.
